data.text: @dbearak @BKGlueGuys I think everyone says it doesn’t, but honestly I’ll wait to see how it plays out. I see him playing more toward end

@Viper777H @SadNetsSaveUsBG @BKGlueGuys @NYCMayor @RealJayWilliams @wojespn I'm a Knicks fan LOL but ... 

The crazy thing is how I applied for FULLY remote jobs, had interviews but due to not being Vaccinated wasn't hired 😑

@SadNetsSaveUsBG @CocolosoR @BKGlueGuys @NYCMayor @RealJayWilliams @wojespn I think the mayor is tossing the ball back to Kai's employer NBA which Adam Silver has made his stand earlier the rule is not fair. I believe Kai will be playing on Mar 13th.
@CocolosoR @BKGlueGuys @NYCMayor @RealJayWilliams @wojespn Yea I know, but I don't have any faith in this reasonable accommodation statement being a pathway to seeing him play in Brooklyn.
@Viper777H @BKGlueGuys @NYCMayor 7/11 has an employee that doesn’t show up for work.
@SadNetsSaveUsBG @BKGlueGuys @NYCMayor @RealJayWilliams @wojespn Nyc has always said remote workers aren't Subject to vaccine mandate
@JetsHaider @BKGlueGuys @NYCMayor Reasonable is whatever the Nets decide it is unless otherwise narrowly defined or if the city sues…
@BKGlueGuys @NYCMayor So why exactly is Brooklyn not providing this exemption to Kyrie? This is crazy. Maybe we can ask in the next presser
